scripts.test: npm run test-ideas; npm run test-users; npm run test-support
scripts.test-ideas: NODE_ENV=testing MODE=testing DEBUG=Show-Idea mocha --require should -R spec --exit --check-leaks ./tests/unit/ideas.js ./tests/api/ideas-get.js
scripts.test-users: NODE_ENV=testing MODE=testing DEBUG=Show-Idea mocha --require should -R spec --exit --check-leaks ./tests/unit/users.js ./tests/api/users/auth.js
scripts.test-support: NODE_ENV=testing MODE=testing DEBUG=Show-Idea mocha --require should -R spec --exit --check-leaks ./tests/unit/support.js
scripts.build: tsc main.ts lib/*.ts tests/unit/*.ts tests/api/*.ts tests/api/users/auth.ts
